meanings.definition: A person who is signed to the same record label as another artist.
meanings.sent1: My labelmate and I both released albums this month.
meanings.sent2: Taylor Swift and Ed Sheeran are labelmates under the same record company.
meanings.sent3: When my labelmate accidentally sang the wrong lyrics on stage, it became a funny moment.
meanings.sent4: Being labelmates with a famous singer is like sharing a spotlight.
meanings.sent5: I always look forward to collaborating with my talented labelmate.

meanings.definition: An artist who shares the same record label as another artist.
meanings.sent1: My labelmate and I often perform together at music events.
meanings.sent2: Ariana Grande and Justin Bieber are labelmates at Universal Music Group.
meanings.sent3: During the label's party, my labelmate surprised everyone with a magic trick.
meanings.sent4: In the music industry, having a supportive labelmate can make all the difference.
meanings.sent5: My labelmate's unique style always inspires me to push my boundaries.
